summary: In the Camargue, France, a young boy bonds with a white haired horse that escaped from ranchers.
cast: Alain Emery|Laurent Roche|Clan-Clan|Pascal Lamorisse|Francois Perie|Charles Guillaume|Alain Colomb Daunant|Denys Colomb de Daunant|Charles Fouhetty|Pierre Bestieux|Pierre Moureaux-Nery|Jean-Pierre Grenier|Frank Silvera|Peter Strauss
title: Crin blanca
